description: This file defines a class S3TextReader that reads text files from S3 storage, processes them using textract, and returns Document objects. It includes methods for synchronous and asynchronous reading, handles external dependencies, and logs operations.

classes.name: S3TextReader
classes.description: A reader class for extracting text documents from S3 objects, supporting both synchronous and asynchronous operations.

methods.name: read
methods.description: Reads an S3Object, downloads the file, extracts text content using textract, and returns a list of Document objects. Supports chunking if enabled.

methods.name: async_read
methods.description: Asynchronously reads an S3Object by running the synchronous read method in a separate thread, returning a list of Document objects.
